title: Beautiful Fully Furnished E Austin Home - Avail 7/20!
posting_body: Stunning fully furnished home in the heart of East Austin.
The wood flooring, high ceilings, and abundant natural light flow throughout create a warm ambiance.
Great for entertaining guests around the large center island with granite countertops and bar seating.
The appliances in the kitchen include a gas range, dishwasher, built-in microwave, and Refridgerator.
The dreamy natural light opens the room up to the private yard that backs Zaragoza Park.
End your evenings on the backyard patio or by the fireplace in the living room.
The large primary suite is situated on the main floor tucked away from the living spaces.
It features an en suite bath, walk-in closet, and french doors to the backyard patio.
The en suite bathroom has a double vanity, luxe walk-in shower, and soaking tub.
The additional entertaining space upstairs features a wet bar and sitting area that leads to the large outdoor living area.
This is perfect for relaxing and entertaining and enjoying an evening with friends or soaking up the sun during the day.
Completing the home are two secondary bedrooms and two full bathrooms.
The garage accommodates two vehicles and room for guests on the driveway.
A few minutes to Whole Foods, Target, and Salitto Plaza.
Close to East Austin restaurants such as Justine’s, Juniper, Ramen Tatsu-YA, Suerte, and many more.
Blocks to Lady Bird Lake and the hike and bike trail.
Easy access to Downtown and the airport.
Zaragoza park is a community spot with a basketball court, volleyball court, picnic areas, and an indoor recreation center.
Text Seth for more information or to schedule a showing!
show contact info
Seth, Realtor with Team Price
